content: Is there any way to detect CPU features under core library only?

luojia65 said:

Is there any way to detect CPU features under core library only?

No, because there is no arch-portable way to do so in core.

I need to update this in a couple ways, but if your concern is x86-only, I wrote https://crates.io/crates/core_detect for this purpose at one point. But as mentioned it can't really be done for no_std on most other architectures.
